item.title: Lighttpd and upload_max_filesize
item.description: Default setting for uploading file size in PHP is really small. Usually it’s about 2MB. To increase this limit, you need to change one obvious variable: upload_max_filesize = 20M Eventually you can also increase max number of files to upload: max_file_uploads = 20 But… this is not enough.
